00100 BrisaSSDPServer::BrisaSSDPServer(QObject *parent) :
00101     QObject(parent),
00102     running(false),
00103     SSDP_ADDR("239.255.255.250"), // TODO: make this as #define
00104     SSDP_PORT(1900), // TODO: make this as #define
00105     S_SSDP_PORT("1900") // TODO: make this as #defin
00106 {
00107     this->udpListener = new QUdpSocket();
00108     connect(this->udpListener, SIGNAL(readyRead()), this, SLOT(datagramReceived()));
00109 }
00110 
00111 BrisaSSDPServer::~BrisaSSDPServer() {
00112     if (isRunning())
00113         stop();
00114 
00115     delete this->udpListener;
00116 }
00117 
00118 void BrisaSSDPServer::start() {
00119     if (!isRunning()) {
00120         if (!udpListener->bind(QHostAddress(SSDP_ADDR), SSDP_PORT, QUdpSocket::ShareAddress))
00121             qDebug() << "BrisaSSDPServer NOT LISTENING!";
00122 
00123         int fd;
00124         fd = udpListener->socketDescriptor();
00125 
00126         struct ip_mreq mreq;
00127         memset(&mreq, 0, sizeof(ip_mreq));
00128         mreq.imr_multiaddr.s_addr = inet_addr(SSDP_ADDR.toUtf8());
00129         mreq.imr_interface.s_addr = htonl(INADDR_ANY);
00130 
00131         // TODO: improve this to allow use of loopback interface
00132         if (::setsockopt(fd,
00133                          IPPROTO_IP,
00134                          IP_ADD_MEMBERSHIP,
00135                          (const char *) &mreq,
00136                          sizeof(struct ip_mreq)) < 0)
00137         {
00138             qDebug() << "BrisaSSDPServer could not join MULTICAST group";
00139             return;
00140         }
00141 
00142         qDebug() << "BrisaSSDPServer Started!";
00143         running = true;
00144     } else {
00145         qDebug() << "BrisaSSDPServer already running!";
00146     }
00147 }
00148 
00149 void BrisaSSDPServer::stop() {
00150     if (isRunning()) {
00151         udpListener->disconnectFromHost();
00152         running = false;
00153     } else {
00154         qDebug() << "BrisaSSDPServer already stopped!";
00155     }
00156 }
00157 
00158 bool BrisaSSDPServer::isRunning() {
00159     return running;
00160 }

00162 void BrisaSSDPServer::doNotify(const QString &usn,
00163                                const QString &location,
00164                                const QString &st,
00165                                const QString &server,
00166                                const QString &cacheControl)
00167 {
00168     QString message = UPNP_ALIVE_MESSAGE.arg(cacheControl, location, st, server, usn);
00169 
00170     udpListener->writeDatagram(message.toUtf8(),
00171                                QHostAddress(SSDP_ADDR),
00172                                SSDP_PORT);
00173 
00174     udpListener->writeDatagram(message.toUtf8(),
00175                                QHostAddress(SSDP_ADDR),
00176                                SSDP_PORT);
00177 
00178     qDebug() << "BrisaSSDPServer writing Notify alive for: " << usn << "";
00179 }

00181 void BrisaSSDPServer::doByeBye(const QString &usn, const QString &st) {
00182     QString message = UPNP_BYEBYE_MESSAGE.arg(st, usn);
00183 
00184     udpListener->writeDatagram(message.toUtf8(),
00185                                QHostAddress(SSDP_ADDR),
00186                                SSDP_PORT);
00187 
00188     udpListener->writeDatagram(message.toUtf8(),
00189                                QHostAddress(SSDP_ADDR),
00190                                SSDP_PORT);
00191 
00192     qDebug() << "BrisaSSDPServer writing notify byebye for: " << usn << "";
00193 }
00194 
00195 void BrisaSSDPServer::datagramReceived() {
00196     while (this->udpListener->hasPendingDatagrams()) {
00197         QByteArray datagram;
00198         QHostAddress *senderIP = new QHostAddress();
00199         quint16 senderPort;
00200 
00201         datagram.resize(this->udpListener->pendingDatagramSize());
00202         this->udpListener->readDatagram(datagram.data(),
00203                                         datagram.size(),
00204                                         senderIP,
00205                                         &senderPort);
00206 
00207         QString temp(datagram);
00208         QHttpRequestHeader *parser = new QHttpRequestHeader(temp);
00209 
00210         this->msearchReceived(parser, senderIP, senderPort);
00211 
00212         delete senderIP;
00213         delete parser;
00214     }
00215 }
00216 
00217 void BrisaSSDPServer::msearchReceived(QHttpRequestHeader *datagram,
00218                                       QHostAddress *senderIp,
00219                                       quint16 senderPort)
00220 {
00221     if (!datagram->hasKey("man"))
00222         return;
00223 
00224     if (datagram->value("man") == "\"ssdp:discover\"") {
00225         qDebug() << "BrisaSSDPServer Received msearch from "
00226                  << senderIp->toString() << ":" << senderPort
00227                  << " Search target: " << datagram->value("st");
00228 
00229         emit msearchRequestReceived(datagram->value("st"),
00230                                     senderIp->toString(),
00231                                     senderPort);
00232     }
00233 }
00234 
00235 void BrisaSSDPServer::respondMSearch(const QString &senderIp,
00236                                      quint16 senderPort,
00237                                      const QString &cacheControl,
00238                                      const QString &date,
00239                                      const QString &location,
00240                                      const QString &server,
00241                                      const QString &st,
00242                                      const QString &usn)
00243 {
00244     QString message = UPNP_MSEARCH_RESPONSE.arg(cacheControl, date, location, server, st, usn);
00245 
00246     this->udpListener->writeDatagram(message.toUtf8(),
00247                                      QHostAddress(senderIp),
00248                                      senderPort);
00249 
00250     qDebug() << "BrisaSSDPServer writing msearch response for " << senderIp << ":" << senderPort;
00251 }
